name: Megagirl DD21
description:
CONTROLLER ONLY, M+KB cannot play my game

Left Joystick -Move

Right Joystick - Camera Move/Aim weapon

Y button- Toggle Lock-On Mode

A button - Jump

L Bumper - Dash

R Bumper-Shoot

Start Button - Toggles Inverted Vertical Aim

Jump + Dash for more distance
Collect Gems and defect the Enemies in the cave to win

THIS IS STILL VERY MUCH A WORK IN PROGRESS, THERE ARE MANY KNOWN BUGS. THIS DEMO IS FOR AGDG DEMO DAY 21 AS A PLAYTEST PROTOTYPE
